resources.string: %1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
This application enables the G Suite domain administrators to manage the device.
This device will no longer be managed by %1$s.
This device will no longer be managed by %1$s. All your Managed Google Accounts will be removed.
This device will no longer be managed by %1$s. All your Managed Google Accounts and work profile will be removed.
This account %1$s will no longer be managed by your administrators.
This account %1$s will be removed from this device and the administrators will not be able to manage the device using this account.
This account %1$s and the work profile will be removed from this device and the administrators will not be able to manage the device using this account.
Touch Activate to set this application as the device policy manager or touch Cancel to go back.
Touch Activate to set this application as the device policy manager or touch Cancel to unregister.
Touch to set the device PIN/password.
Encryption not supported by this device.
Your Domain Administrator has set some policies for this device. Touch to view details.
Touch to add account in work profile.
You had started the work profile creation. Touch to add account in work profile and complete the work profile creation.
Device is approved by your domain administrators
An alarm from My Devices server.
A domain administrator has wiped account %1$s from this device using Device Policy. This device is no longer being administered using Device Policy.
A domain administrator has wiped account %1$s from this device using Device Policy.

"This application allows administrators to enforce policies on how your mobile device is used to access work information. If you are using Gmail or Google mobile apps for personal reasons, you don't need this app.
To keep your data secure, it also allows the admin to remotely wipe data, while you can reset your screen lock code remotely or locate a lost device."
Account %1$s is blocked by your domain administrators.
Use of this application is subject to the Google mobile terms of service and the applicable G Suite terms of service for your organization.
Domain administrators may request a list of applications accessing domain data.
There is no G Suite account on this device.
You must add a G Suite account to continue.
Please add a G Suite account on this work profile.
You will need to sign back in to your G Suite account to complete your work profile creation.
Your device is pending approval by your domain administrators. You will receive a notification once it is approved.
The following domain policy settings will be enforced:
You can do the following actions on your device remotely:

"This device is managed by %1$s and can be used to access corporate resources.
Your organization is able to monitor everything on this device, including accounts, installed apps, web activity, and network connections - even if you are using a personal account. This is likely similar to a work computer provided by your organization."
This app will manage your device:
These policies are required to finish setup

"Your admin at %1$s requires a work profile on this device.
A work profile separates your work data, such as apps, email, and calendar entries, from your personal data.
Your admin will manage the entire device, including your work profile.
You can't access work information on this device without a work profile."

"Your organization's admin requires a work profile on this device.
A work profile separates your work data, such as apps, email, and calendar entries, from your personal data.
Your admin will manage the entire device, including your work profile.
You can't access work information on this device without a work profile."

"A work profile separates your work data, such as apps, email, and calendar entries, from your personal data.
Your admin will manage the entire device, including your work profile."
Sign in with your username & password
"%1$s won't be restored to this device"
"%1$s won't be restored, and it'll be removed from this device"
You do not have any messages.
Device Policy is out of date. Please update.
Administrators can set policies and remotely wipe the device.
Administrators can set policies and remotely wipe the work profile.
Administrators can set policies and remotely wipe the User Profile.
GPS/Wifi location is not enabled. You will not be able to locate the device remotely.
Permission to access location is denied. You will not be able to locate the device remotely.

Failed to sync with server at %1$s.

Device Policy will try to sync again at %2$s.
You have the option of creating a work profile.
Your admin at %1$s requires that you create a work profile.
Authentication failed. Please re-enter your password and try again.
Device sent bad request to server. Please make sure you are running latest version. Otherwise please contact your domain administrators.
Network error. Please try again later.
This account is blocked. Please try with a different account or contact your domain administrators.
The account requires device encryption which is not supported by this device. Please try again with a different account or contact your domain administrator.
There was an unexpected error. Please unregister and re-register your account to fix the issue. Otherwise please contact your domain administrators.
Error encountered while registering account %1$s on the device. Please try again later.
There was an unexpected error while retrieving the data. Please check your network connection or try again later.
This policy is not supported by the device.
This policy does not apply to the device.
The account %1$s is deactivated, as some policies are violated.
Unregister so that this device is no longer managed by your admin.
Unregister this account so it is no longer managed by your admin. This action will also remove your account.
Unregister this account so it is no longer managed by your admin. This action will also remove your work profile.
â€¢ Locate device on a map
â€¢ Ring your device at high volume
"Some device details will be shared with administrators "
Domain administrators can view these details about your device:
Your device does not comply with all security policies set by your administrator. Please take action to resolve this.
Your administrator has set the following security policies on your device.
This device is managed by %1$s. Here are the policies that are enforced on your device.
Your administrator has set the following security policies in your work profile.
Touch to change password; consider changing the password length.
Please unregister all accounts currently registered with the app and register again.
Application audit enabled, administrator can see list of applications installed on the device that access corporate information
Administrators can see the list of applications installed in work profile
Administrators can see the list of applications installed on the device
Administrators can see the details of the accounts added in the work profile
Administrators can see the details of the accounts added on the device
Domain administrators can see these applications because they access corporate information:
Administrators have allowed some system apps
Your domain administrator has allowed following system apps on this device :
Your domain administrator has allowed system apps on this device.
Your domain administrator has disabled system apps on this device.
Your domain administrator has changed the system apps on this device. Touch to review.
None of the user-installed applications access corporate information
Your domain administrator has disabled the following apps:
Some apps have been blocked from uninstallation
Your domain administrator has blocked uninstallation of following apps:
Touch to see these network settings
Domain administrator have added following wireless network configuration(s):
â€¢ Device password must contain a combination of letters and numbers
â€¢ Device password must contain letters or numbers
â€¢ Device password must be set
â€¢ Device password must have at least %1$d characters
â€¢ Lock timeout must not be greater than %1$d minute(s)
â€¢ Device will be wiped clean if you fail to enter the correct password in %1$d attempts
â€¢ Encryption must be enabled on the device
â€¢ Administrators will be able to remotely wipe the device
â€¢ Administrators will be able to remotely remove account from the device
â€¢ Administrators will be able to remotely provision wifi networks
â€¢ Administrators can view installed applications accessing corporate data
â€¢ The %1$d most recent passwords can not be reused on your device
â€¢ Device password expires every %1$d days
â€¢ The camera(s) will be disabled
â€¢ Lock screen widgets will be disabled
â€¢ Location sharing will be disabled
â€¢ Adding and removing accounts will be disabled
â€¢ Wi-Fi settings can not be modified (except on/off)
â€¢ Apps can only be installed from the Play Store
â€¢ Bluetooth settings can not be modified (except on/off)
â€¢ Disallow transfer of data over USB
â€¢ Access to debugging features will not allowed
â€¢ VPN settings can not be modified
â€¢ Tethering & portable hotspot settings can not be modified
â€¢ Device can not be factory reset
â€¢ Adding users will be disabled
â€¢ Removing users will be disabled
â€¢ Modifying device credentials will be disabled
â€¢ Application verification will be enabled
â€¢ Cell broadcasts can not be modified
â€¢ Mobile networks can not be modified
â€¢ Access to application settings is not allowed
â€¢ Mounting physically external SD cards will not be allowed
â€¢ Modifying the microphone volume will not be allowed
â€¢ Modifying the speaker volume will not be allowed
â€¢ Some apps will be disabled
â€¢ Administrators can install certificates on the device
â€¢ Account will be removed from this device after %1$s days of no sync
â€¢ Backup service will be enabled
â€¢ Backup service will be disabled
Device password must contain a combination of letters and numbers
Device password must contain letters or numbers
Device password must have at least %1$d characters
Lock timeout must not be greater than %1$d minutes
Device will be wiped clean if you fail to enter the correct password in %1$d attempts
Encryption must be enabled on the device
Password is required to start the device
Administrators will be able to remotely wipe the device
Administrators will be able to remotely wipe the work profile
Administrators will be able to remotely wipe this user profile
Administrators will be able to remotely remove account from the device
Security related events will be audited
System audit collects the following activity details from this device:
â€¢ Processes started on the device
The %1$d most recent passwords can not be reused on your device
The camera(s) is disabled for this device
Device Policy version must be latest
Adding and removing accounts is disabled
Wi-Fi settings can not be modified (except on/off)

Bluetooth settings can not be modified (except on/off)

Modifying the microphone volume is not allowed
Modifying the speaker volume is not allowed
Disabled sharing content from work profile to Personal space
Strong authentication (password, PIN, or pattern) is required at least every %1$d minute(s)
Strong authentication (password, PIN, or pattern) is required at least every %1$d hour(s)
Capturing screen shots from this device is disallowed
Capturing screen shots of work profile apps is disallowed
Copy paste from work profile to Personal space is disallowed
Notification details are hidden in the lock screen
Further addition of google type accounts is disabled
Administrator installed certificate(s) on this device
Touch to see more details about the certificate(s)
Domain administrator has applied application permissions
Domain administrator has set remote administrator restriction PIN
Your domain administrator installed the following certificate(s):
Administrator has blocked account %1$s. Account password has been removed.
Device Policy is out of date
Device Policy is out of date
Sync the Device Policy app, or your account %1$s will be removed from this device in %2$s days.
Sync the Device Policy app, or your account %1$s will be removed from this device in %2$s day.
Sync the Device Policy app, or your account %1$s will be removed from this device.
Account will be removed from this device after %1$s days of no sync
Your account will be removed in %1$s days. Please sync.
Your account will be removed in 1 day. Please sync.
Your account will be removed. Please sync.
Removed account %1$s, as it did not sync from last %2$s days. This device is no longer being administered using Device Policy.
Removed account %1$s, as it did not sync from last %2$s days.
This is a security-compromised device. Administrator has disabled it.
â€¢ Administrators can disable security-compromised devices
â€¢ Administrators can disable devices without work profile
You can create work profile from owner user only
Your device has still not been registered with Play services. Please try after some time.
You need to encrypt the device before you can create work profile. Press OK to start encryption.

%1$s will be moved to the work profile. You may lose local data already associated with your Google Account on this device. Apps not approved by your IT administrator will not be available inside the work profile.

"Your admin at %1$s requires you to create work profile.
A Work profile separates your work and personal data, including apps, email, calendar entries and more.
You won't be able to access work information on this device without a work profile."

"You may choose to create a work profile to keep work data and personal data separate.
A work profile allows an organisation to securely manage the data associated with the work profile, but leaves everything else on the device like your personal accounts, apps and data under your control."
One place for your work apps
Your organization can manage and monitor all apps and data in your work profile. You control everything else on your device.
"If you don't add a work profile, your organization can make changes that affect your entire device."
Please wait while your work profile is being created.
Installing required corporate apps. This can take a few minutes.
"This seems to be taking longer than usual... if you believe this is an error, you can exit the setup flow and manually proceed."
Please wait while device owner setup is finished.
You can assign device ownership to %1$s. In this mode, your administrator has the ability to fully manage your device.
Yes, I want to assign ownership to %1$s
Note: if you want to continue using this as your personal device, press Skip.

"Your administrator has set the ownership of this device to %1$s. Complete the registration process by tapping Next.
Your administrator has the ability to fully manage this device.
If you skip this setup, you will not be able to access corporate resources on this device. The device will need to be factory reset if you wish to complete the setup later."
Device Owner privilege enabled by administrator
Mismatch between device ownership and policy configuration
There is a mismatch between device ownership and policy configuration. Contact your administrator.
Your administrator has disabled this setting to protect work data.

With this application, your administrator can provision your device with corporate WiFi networks and mobile apps at work. To ensure that corporate data is protected, your administrator can also manage device settings like password and encryption.
Rebooting device into safe mode is disallowed
Data sharing via Android Beam is disallowed
Use of data services when roaming is disallowed
This application is not supported on Chrome devices, please visit our Help Center article to learn more about Chrome device management.
Tap to see policies in work profile
For work profile policies, turn on work mode in Settings > Accounts > Work profile settings
